item.title: From 'Jan Plat' at Charlton House, Mowbray
item.summary: Some words and sentences given by Jan Plat at Charlton House in Mowbray. The contribution includes some personal details, such the names of some of his relations. On p.6046c Lloyd notes that Jan Plat and Dia!kwain left Calvinia together. Words and Sentences. Given by 'Jan Plat' (L VII.-1. 6046a-6046c).
item.comments: 1) Date on p.6046a-opp: 9 January 1884; information about Jan Plat's family: his son is in service and Jan Plat and his wife want the boy back 'badly'; where his wife is, 2) This story is found in Book VII-1
item.author: Jan Plat
